sect2.title: Introduction to XZ-Utils
sect2.para: The XZ-Utils package contains compression/decompression tools for files using the XZ and the earlier LZMA format. This is useful as more and more Gnu Linux packages are being delivered in the XZ format.
XZ-Utils is now installed during the building of an LFS platform. You can download the package from the LFS - All Packages page. Instructions for building XZ-Utils are on the LFS - XZ Utils page.
